description: This view will show samnumbers with emails that do not line up between cloud, ns, and sfdc

schema.name: cloud_sam_number
schema.description: The samnumber of the account associated with this email in cloud

schema.name: sfdc_sam_number
schema.description: The samnumber of the account associated with this email in Salesforce

schema.name: org_id
schema.description: The id of the org associated with the cloud samnumber

schema.name: is_poc_email_in_org
schema.description: Is the SFDC email in the orgs list of user emails
